title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, General forms, GF-30 - Summons (publication)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, General forms, GF-30 - Summons (publication)

State Regulations
F.C.A.ยง 617; General Form 30 CPLR 315, 316 (Summons-..Publication).. 12/97.............................. FAMILY COURT OF THE STATEOF NEWYORK COUNTYOF
_____....................................................... ________________
In the Matter of a Proceedingunder.. Docket

No. Article__ of the Family Court

Act..................................................... SUMMONS..(Publication)..Respondent
________________
IN THE NAME OFTHE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEWYORK TO THE
ABOVE-NAMED RESPONDENT: WHO RESIDES OR IS FOUND AT: _ and to _ address(es)_
the(state relationship) - ___________________________________________
(e) All pleadings, briefs or memor and a which reproduce, paraphrase or disclose any documents which have previously been designated by a
party as comprising or containing Confidential Information or "Highly

Confidential - Attorney's Eyes-Only Information" shall identify such documents
by the production number ascribed to them at the time of production..______________________
YOU AND EACHOF YOU ARE HEREBY SUMMONED to appear before
this Court at, NEWYORK, on _____, 19, at __o'clock in the __noonof
that day to answer the petition and to be dealt with in accordance with Article
__of the Family Court Act._____________
On your failure to appear as herein directed, a warrant
may be issued for your arrest. [Termination of Parental Cases only]: Upon your failure
to appear, all of your parental rights may be terminated and your failure to
appear shall further constitute a denial of your interest in the child(ren) who
are the subject of the proceeding, which denial may result, without further
notice, in the transfer or commitment of the child('s) (ren's) care, custody or
guardianship or in the child('s) (ren's) adoption in this or any subsequent
proceeding in which such care, custody or guardianship or adoption may be at
issue. Dated: ______, 19. Clerk of the Court
TO THE ABOVE-NAMED RESPONDENT(S): The foregoing summons is served upon you by publication
pursuant to an Order of the Hon., Judge of the Family Court, _______ County, dated and filed with the petition and other papers in the Office of the Clerk
of the Family Court, _______
County.____________________________________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, General forms, GF-30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
